item.title:
The Pacific Ocean encompasses ~ 1/3 of the Earth's surface and it's larger than Earth's entire landmass combined.
This satellite photo composite taken in 2014 (with four tropical cyclones) also shows the 'Pacific perspective': a planet covered by water
https://t.co/iRDWjHNJZP https://t.co/o8llsYxBSu
